verbose_text: A gene cluster for a sulfate ABC transporter (sbpA, cysT, cysW, cysA, and an additional ORF SYNPCC7002_A0796, see Text S5 in Supplementary Material) and a sodium / sulfate symporter (sac1) showed strong increases in transcript levels under S limitation, whereas the transcript level of a sulfate permease (SYNPCC7002_A2424) was about 4-fold lower upon S limitation.
